mapper.select: SELECT I_ID AS idspm, I_IDSPP AS id, C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahun, I_SPPNO AS noSpp, D_SPPNO AS tglSpp, C_JENIS AS kodeJenis, C_BEBAN AS kodeBeban, I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", N_PPTK AS namaPptk, I_PPTK_NIP AS nipPptk, C_UANGMUKA AS kodeUangMuka, C_BULAN AS bulan, KET AS keterangan, N_SKPD AS "skpd.namaSkpd", I_SPMNO AS noSpm, D_SPMNO AS tglSpm, nilaiSpp FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, T.I_ID, P.I_ID AS I_IDSPP, P.C_ANGG_TAHUN, P.I_SPPNO, P.D_SPPNO, T.I_SPMNO, T.D_SPMNO, P.C_JENIS, P.C_BEBAN, P.I_IDSKPD, P.C_BULAN, T.E_SPM AS KET, S.N_SKPD, T.C_UANGMUKA, P.I_PPTK_NIP, P.N_PPTK, (SELECT SUM (SBL.V_SPP) FROM TMSPPRINCIBL SBL WHERE SBL.I_IDSPP = p.I_ID) AS nilaiSpp FROM TMSPP P INNER JOIN TMSPPCETAK C ON C.I_ID = P.I_ID LEFT JOIN TMSPM T ON T.I_IDSPP = P.I_ID LEFT JOIN trskpd S ON S.I_ID = P.I_IDSKPD WHERE P.C_BEBAN = 'TU' AND P.I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} AND P.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} and not exists (select 1 from tmspmcetak where T.i_id = tmspmcetak.i_id) ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset} ORDER BY I_SPMNO

SELECT COUNT (*) AS banyak FROM ( SELECT I_ID AS idspm, I_IDSPP AS id, C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahun, I_SPPNO AS noSpp, D_SPPNO AS tglSpp, C_JENIS AS kodeJenis, C_BEBAN AS kodeBeban, I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", N_PPTK AS namaPptk, I_PPTK_NIP AS nipPptk, C_UANGMUKA AS kodeUangMuka, C_BULAN AS bulan, KET AS keterangan, N_SKPD AS "skpd.namaSkpd", I_SPMNO AS noSpm, D_SPMNO AS tglSpm, nilaiSpp FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, T.I_ID, P.I_ID AS I_IDSPP, P.C_ANGG_TAHUN, P.I_SPPNO, P.D_SPPNO, T.I_SPMNO, T.D_SPMNO, P.C_JENIS, P.C_BEBAN, P.I_IDSKPD, P.C_BULAN, T.E_SPM AS KET, S.N_SKPD, T.C_UANGMUKA, P.I_PPTK_NIP, P.N_PPTK, (SELECT SUM (SBL.V_SPP) FROM TMSPPRINCIBL SBL WHERE SBL.I_IDSPP = p.I_ID) AS nilaiSpp FROM TMSPP P INNER JOIN TMSPPCETAK C ON C.I_ID = P.I_ID LEFT JOIN TMSPM T ON T.I_IDSPP = P.I_ID LEFT JOIN trskpd S ON S.I_ID = P.I_IDSKPD WHERE P.C_BEBAN = 'TU' AND P.I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} AND P.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} and not exists (select 1 from tmspmcetak where T.i_id = tmspmcetak.i_id) ) )

SELECT T.I_ID AS id, T.C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahun, T.I_SPPNO AS noSpp, T.D_SPPNO AS tglSpp, T.C_JENIS AS kodeJenis, T.C_BEBAN AS kodeBeban, T.I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", P.N_SKPD AS "skpd.namaSkpd", T.N_PPTK AS namaPptk, T.N_PPTK AS namaBendahara, T.I_PPTK_NIP AS nipPptk, T.I_PPTK_NIP AS nipBendahara, T.C_UANGMUKA AS kodeUangMuka, T.C_BULAN || '/' || T.C_ANGG_TAHUN AS bulan, T.E_SPP AS keterangan, S.I_SPMNO AS noSpm, S.D_SPMNO AS tglSpm, null AS noNpwp, COALESCE( S.E_SPM, T.E_SPP) AS keteranganSpm, T.C_BANK_TRANSFER AS kodeBank, T.N_BANK AS namaBank, T.I_REK_BANK AS noRekeningSPM ,S.I_ID as idspm FROM TMSPP T INNER JOIN TMSPPCETAK C ON C.I_ID = T.I_ID LEFT JOIN trskpd p ON P.I_ID = T.I_IDSKPD LEFT JOIN TMSPM S ON S.I_IDSPP = T.I_ID WHERE T.I_ID = #{value}

SELECT c_angg_tahun as tahun, i_idskpd as idSkpd, I_id as idSpd, i_spdno as noSpd, d_spdno as tglSpd, C_KEGIATAN || '/' || N_KEGIATAN AS kegiatan, c_akun || '/' || n_akun as akun, V_SPp as nilaiSpp FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT D.c_angg_tahun, D.i_idskpd, D.I_id, D.i_spdno, D.d_spdno, tmdpakegiatan.C_KEGIATAN, tmdpakegiatan.N_KEGIATAN, TMSPPRINCIBL.I_IDBAS, TRBAS.C_AKUN, TRBAS.N_AKUN, SUM (TMSPPRINCIBL.v_spp) AS V_SPp FROM tmspd D, TMSPDRINCIBL B, TMSPDSAH H,tmdpakegiatan, TMSPPRINCIBL, TRBAS WHERE (D.I_id = B.I_IDSPD) AND (D.I_id = H.I_ID) and tmdpakegiatan.I_ID = B.I_IDKEGIATAN AND TMSPPRINCIBL.I_IDSPD = B.I_IDKEGIATAN AND TMSPPRINCIBL.I_IDBAS = TRBAS.I_ID AND D.c_jenis = '3' AND D.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND D.i_idskpd = #{idskpd} and TMSPPRINCIBL.I_IDSPP =#{idspp} GROUP BY D.c_angg_tahun, D.i_idskpd, D.I_id , D.i_spdno, D.d_spdno, tmdpakegiatan.C_KEGIATAN, tmdpakegiatan.N_KEGIATAN, TMSPPRINCIBL.I_IDBAS, TRBAS.C_AKUN, TRBAS.N_AKUN )a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMSPM ( I_ID, I_IDSPP, C_ANGG_TAHUN, I_SPMNO, D_SPMNO, I_IDSKPD, E_SPM, C_UANGMUKA) VALUES ( SEQ_TMSPM.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{tahun},#{noSpm},#{tglSpm}, #{skpd.idSkpd} , REPLACE ( REPLACE (REPLACE (#{keteranganSpm} , CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' '), CHR(9), ' ' ) ,#{kodeUangMuka} )

INSERT INTO TMSPMRINCIBL (I_ID, I_IDSPM, I_IDSPP, I_IDBL, I_IDKEGIATAN, I_IDBAS, V_SPM, I_PGUN_REKAM, D_PGUN_REKAM ) VALUES ( SEQ_I_SPMNO.NEXTVAL ,#{idspm}, #{idspp}, #{idBl}, #{kegiatan.idKegiatan}, #{akun.idAkun}, #{nilaiSpp}, #{idEntry}, #{tglEntry})
UPDATE TMSPM SET D_SPMNO = #{tglSpm}, E_SPM = REPLACE ( REPLACE (REPLACE (#{keteranganSpm} , CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' '), CHR(9), ' ' ) WHERE I_ID = #{idspm}
